data.message: Then they end up in the rivers, sea or any other place lazy folk fancy throwing them. Put a deposit on them and they might be returned/recycled!

replies.message: Hi Deirdre, at this stage our focus is on recovering all of our packaging so none of it ends up as litter or in the oceans and we’re working hard to ensure our packaging is as sustainable as possible. We’re committed to supporting any well-designed initiative that could improve recovering and recycling rates, including a deposit return scheme. Ultimately that decision must be led by Government but requiring many organisations, – public and private – to work in partnership.
